page.title: 18Home Life in The Lee
page.content: {Mornings}A household starts the day with breakfast eaten in the kitchen. Father probably leaves first. Mother takes the younger ones to school, walking or in the family car, older ones take the school bus. {Housekeeping}Mother works or occupies herself with housekeeping & voluntary work. Household aids are electric cookers, deep freezers, refrigerators, washing machines, vacuum cleaners & some food processors, dish washers & microwave ovens. {Afternoons}Nursery children come home for lunch.Village school closes at 3pm & older ones return later.Children have tea - their main meal. Older ones then do homework & adults eat later. {Entertainment}Most homes have television & radio/record players,some video recorders. An older school-girl will babysit if the adults go out.
